title: Update: Should She Confront The Man She's Dating For Pretending To Be Someone He's Not?
description:
Her friends hooked her up with a guy she assumed was wealthy. On their first date, he went above and beyond to make her feel special. However on the second date, she noticed something strange.
Now she thinks he's pretending to be someone he isn't, but she's not upset about it. Should she tell him she knows the truth about who he's pretending to be? Or should she wait to see how long he keeps up this charade?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
